main.name: Faisal AL Mahmud
main.description: Currently, working with a future leading company based in Bangladesh which is already awarded in Digital Marketing/ Advertising Category at BASIS National ICT Awards 2019.
main.bio: A passionate software developer who loved to take challenge, dedicated to work, open to learn, curious about new technology, self guided, self motivated and good team player. I believe that only skill and dedication can help someone to reach his goal.
main.contactmessage: I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
